Our Story
/$
$
A Newberry native with deep roots in the heart of the city, the owner of Capricious Local Eatery has called downtown home since childhood. Growing up just steps from where her restaurant now stands, she was an active member of the Newberry High School community, involved in sports, clubs, and volunteering. Her lifelong dream of sharing her love for Newberry with its residents culminated in the creation of Capricious. Today, amidst the demands of running a successful business, she remains dedicated to the community, even coaching local youth soccer. By supporting Capricious Local Eatery, you're not just enjoying great food; you're investing in the fabric of Newberry itself.
GO PANTHERS!!!!
/$
/$
/$
$
$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
In the Kitchen
/$
$
At Capricious Local Eatery, we believe in celebrating the bounty of our local farmers. Our eclectic menu is a testament to our commitment to fresh, seasonal ingredients. By sourcing directly from our community, we not only support local businesses but also ensure that every dish is bursting with flavor. Come experience the heart and soul of our quickly growing small town on every plate.
​
​
